p: Results of autopsies from Wuhan province, China, have also shown infiltration of lymphocytes and monocytes in the portal area with microthrombosis and congestion of hepatic sinuses [ 27]. The liver was described as having hepatocyte degeneration accompanied by lobular focal necrosis and neutrophil infiltration. Though histological features of liver failure and bile duct injuries were not observed in these cases [ 27].
